name: css-cursors
description: Css module of single purpose classes for cursors

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-cursors.css > css/css-cursors.css && tachyons src/css-cursors.css --minify > css/css-cursors.min.css && tachyons src/css-cursors.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
